Package jetbrains.mps.vfs.refresh

Interface CachingFileSystem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FileSystem, FileSystem
    public interface CachingFileSystem
extends FileSystem
    special fs for the caching files AP : Now I think we could achieve the same introducing a boolean method in FileSystem Created by apyshkin on 6/20/16.
